DOC.brief_summary: We examine whether application electro-neuro-muscular stimulation ( ENMS ) critical care patient , decrease impact severity critical illness myopathy ( CIM ) neuropathy . We also assess whether electro-neuro-muscular stimulation affect incidence density rate nosocomial pneumonia ICU . Patients divide two group , Group A Group B chosen random . In Group A conventional physiotherapy apply Group B , ENMS also apply additional physiotherapy , quadriceps muscle . The total time apply ENMS 1 hour , applied start physiotherapy per day hospitalization 10 day patient . The definition CIM base pathology muscular biopsy ( quadriceps ) . Patients undergo biopsy 1st 11th day enter study . The technique Gomori Trichrome use determine existence absence myopathy . In addition ATPase technique apply different price PH ( PH : 9,4 , PH : 4,6 PH : 4.3 ) , thus achieve separation myopathy neuropathy . The primary outcome study incidence myopathy group , day 12th . Considering incidence myopathy critically ill patient 80 % reduce rate 50 % intervention group use statistical power equal 0.80 level p < 0.05 , 12 number patient require group .
